body:
So recently i got myself a fairly new mic i guess and i noticed that it sounds a lot better than my previous one.
for those of you who still remember how bad my mic was from before, here's how it looked like... https://imgur.com/PCBMrp4

And here is my mic now... https://imgur.com/a/boOQJ

Now if i wanted to i'll probably save up for a headset and mic like this https://imgur.com/uJC11wR

(A bit of a late post but just wanted to put this out)

title: My Mic

replies.body: Microphones inbuilt in headphones usually are bad. But if you don't want to become a youtuber, it is ok ;)
replies.body_tagged: Microphones inbuilt in headphones usually are bad. But if you don't want to become a youtuber, it is ok ;)

replies.body: I'd suggest you Logitech g230. Not really expensive and it is useful.
replies.body_tagged: I'd suggest you Logitech g230. Not really expensive and it is useful.

replies.body: they're not as good as non built in ones (usually) but your statement "Microphones inbuilt in headphones usually are bad" is not true
